alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 11:17PM CDT until May 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Clay County in northern Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bluegrove, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Bellevue, Lake Arrowhead, Bluegrove and Joy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
